comment: Suman bro, never change yourself, thoda chillana Kam kar sakta hai maybe, but maza aaya bahut tere saath reh kar. Really passionate and dedicated person, who is always there to help you in every way possible. Best of luck bro, and let's work together again in the future.

comment: You are such a lucky guy, whenever you ask me for anything, things just align your way so easily. Thanks for carrying the BTP in my virtual absence and helping me during intern when I lost my phone. You are equally fun and irritating (bcuz of Gyan) guy to be around.
